short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web SQL Console for Apache Solr.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web SQL Console for Apache Solr. 
Apache SOLR 6.0 introduced a possibility to query your solr with SQL queries.
This is a simple app that provides simple SQL console to test your SOLR SQL Queries.
